desc: The Original Folding Boat Co makes packable, portable boats that store in their own backpack, set up in four minutes and are designed with adventure in mind. Basically, there’s no reason to leave it at home. Unfold your next adventure with our foldable kayaks and boats.

layout.text:
After many great years selling our boats, meeting you all at trade shows, festivals and events, and - of course - paddling the waters around the globe in our K-Pak Folding Boats, we are closing the (virtual) doors of our online store.
We will still be ‘around’ though, so if you have any questions about our folding boats, please reach out any time.

We thank you for so many great moments and watery adventures, and hope to see you out there and catch up in the future!
